entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui iOS app with defined UISceneConfigurations crashes on force-close with error "System.InvalidOperationException: Window was already destroyed" #24191
  • Unable to upgrade nuget package Microsoft.Maui.Controls and Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility 8.0.14 to 8.0.7 #24190
  • Issue with updating to Microsoft.Identity.Client v4.61.0 #24189
  • MAUI XAML errors about ContentPage (and others) not found #24188
  • Runtime pack errors for new MAUI project #24187
  • Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection gives exception and prevents the app from running #24186
  • Exception on MAUI after Update #24185
  • DependencyInjetion fires together with maui Exceptions #24184
  • Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State Error (active) CS0104 'Permissions' is an ambiguous reference between 'Microsoft.Maui.Ap #24183
  • Adding IconImageSource to the contentpage in xaml crashes in .NET MAUI for IOS #24182
  • .net MAUI Blazor App Lambda expressions in @for loop capturing incorrect index value #24181
  • .Net Maui c# Android MainPage.xaml.cs Can't access Methods from Button call #24180
  • premissions .Net Maui c# android do not work #24179
  • .NET MAUI App Crashes in Release Mode but works fine in debug mode. #24178
  • IOS and ANDROID status bar cannot change color #24177
  • Windows does not raise Tapped event while Android does. #24175
  • MAUI create a pdf same as content page #24174
  • MAUI Permission for Write Storage is always Denied in Android #24173
  • How to enable auto-update for Microsoft, Apple and Android Store published .MAUI Blazor App? #24172
  • Maui Label line spacing between 1st and 2nd lines is not the same as line spacing between subsequent lines #24171
  • .NET Maui does not support FontAutoScalingEnabled for windows platform #24170
  • Toolbar is not displayed after deactive an app and activate it again. #24169
  • Maui Frame - Shadow on Frame not working on Maui #24168
  • Vertical CarouselView with PeekAreaInsets crashes on iOS #24166
  • Path with ArcSegments is sporadically drawn offset from expected arc #24163
  • About MAUI appicon and splash not updating on iOS device #24159
  • Global defined EventTriggers get triggered twice #24152
  • [Testing] CollectionViewInfiniteScroll #24148
    Backlog
  • [Testing] HandlerDoesNotLeak.DatePicker #24147
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Fix EnsureSupportForCustomWebViewClients #24146
    .NET 8 SR9

Closed

  • Expandable Editor allows cursor to go behind keyboard on iOS. Works fine in Android #24162
  • Can't Change Printer in Print Dialog in .Net Maui Blazor Hybrid #23971
  • [Android] App crash when using a binding value that exceeds Entry max length #23423
    Backlog
  • Java.Lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: 'setSpan ( ... ) ends beyond length #19689
    .NET 8 SR9
  • FlexLayout inside of an ScrollView doesn't scroll on iOS #10256
    Backlog
  • CarouselView current item isn't changing #12113
    Backlog
  • Can't control on view height when soft keyboard appears because it covers typing message #24145
  • MAUI_splashscreen: How to set Splash screen for Light and Dark mode for iOS and Android #12944
    Backlog
  • Consider making IsPointerOver property public #13046
    Backlog
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps for Windows #20356
    Backlog
  • Label Autofit Font #12428
    Backlog
  • Content inside frame not visible #12099
    Backlog
  • Macos M1 Max Editor cannot scroll #10221
    Backlog
  • Maui hangs in InitializeComponent (Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Xaml.Extensions.LoadFromXaml) #10031
    Backlog
  • Maui android published apk crash #9697
    Backlog
  • Connectivity issue in API 34 #24149
  • [8.0.80 SR8] OnIdiom + AppThemeBinding is not working in Release Mode [Android] #24150
  • [MAUI] The list does not show newly added recipes #22417
    .NET 8 SR9
  • [net9.0] Controls DeviceTests hang #23403
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Crash - Android condition `xref_count == xref_index' not met, function:processing_build_callback_data #23827
  • Failure Building Due to Splash Screen Image splashSplashScreen.png #15515

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Fix memory leak w/ main window #24176
    platform/windows 🪟, memory-leak 💦
  • Move EnsureSupportForCustomWebViewClients to Appium #24167
  • UI testing doc changes #24165
    area-docs
  • 894511 : Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24161
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for the CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled #24160
    community ✨
  • Fix Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24156
    community ✨
  • [net8.0] Update macios to latest stable release #24155
  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing

Merged

  • [ci] Simplify shipping drop metadata names #24103
    area-infrastructure
  • Correct "can not" to "cannot" in messages, comments, etc. #24124
    area-xaml
  • Remove MAUI styling from Blazor Hybrid template #24135
    area-templates
  • Add new Blazor Hybrid Solution template to CODEOWNERS #24137
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [Android] App crash when text exceeds Entry MaxLength #24138
    community ✨, fixed-in-net8.0-nightly

Updated

  • [X] allow namescope resolution before parenting #22854
    area-xaml
  • Remove MAUI styling from Blazor Hybrid Solution template #24136
    area-templates
  • WIP: Add xUnit types to avoid first-chance exceptions in tests #24130
    area-testing
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24115
    area-infrastructure
  • Build the previous TFMs #23896
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc1
  • [Android] Fix ToolbarItem font color issue after changing available state. #24065
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • 2174059 MAUI hit testing ignores pages loaded by PushModalAsync #24109
  • [Windows] Fix Span Foreground property #24063
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • [Binding SG] Use Binding.Create internally in MAUI #23722
  • [Testing] Ported randomly failing tests to Appium #24036
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • Add Android LoadImageFromFont benchmark and enable verbose Glide logging #24033
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for Entry SelectionLength #24064
    community ✨
  • [Binding SG] Enable usage of private fields and properties in SetBinding path #23810
    area-xaml
  • HybridWebView: Invoke JS methods from .NET #23769
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Place images in `drawable-nodpi` folder to stop scaling. #24039
  • [iOS] Shadow for clipped visual element #23872
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
